content: meet this beautiful and easy crochet baby blanket - instant download beautiful and classic baby afghan is a joy to crochet it s stunning with a gorgeous natural transitioning ombre yarn but would look equally well in a solid color or planned striping pattern note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own lovely crochet basket with handles > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern materials needed * worsted weight yarn * crochet hook size i 9/5 50 mm * tapestry needle and scissors blanket size approximate finished size is 31 x 31 but easy to adjust to other sizes pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-ripple-baby-blanket/
